A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dreadful\, I'm a huge fan of star wars and couldn't wait to see this film. It was set up to be so much more but this was simply awful. It was unbelievably childish\, the writing was dreadful\, the jokes were far too many and just didn't work. The characters weren't developed at all. I am a fan but not what you would call a fan boy. I lover the idea of star wars going in a different direction\, doing something new but not this.. I will see the next episode\, its star wars and JJ Abrams is back but I'm not confident after this mess.
